pages.text:
Ant Jars are items used to pick up ant queens.
Rightclicking an ant queen with an empty and jar will pick it up.
You can place it back down by rightclicking with it on a block again (if there is an ant queen inside.
You can also place it down by shift rightclicking see $(l:antsportation:blocks/ant_jar_block)ant jar block

Filled ant jars can be rightclicked on ant hills to put the queen inside.
You can also click the hill with an empty jar and this will put the queen in the jar again.
